meanings.definition: A member of a secret society or gang, especially in the Chinese community, known for criminal activities.
meanings.sent1: The highbinders gathered in the dimly lit alley to plan their next crime.
meanings.sent2: The police were on high alert for any highbinders operating in the area.
meanings.sent3: The highbinders thought they were being sneaky, but everyone knew about their secret meetings.
meanings.sent4: The highbinders' influence in the underworld was like a shadowy web spreading across the city.
meanings.sent5: The highbinders' notorious reputation struck fear into the hearts of the townspeople.

meanings.definition: To engage in illegal or dishonest practices, especially in a secretive or deceptive manner.
meanings.sent1: The criminals decided to highbind their way through the security system.
meanings.sent2: He was caught highbinders in the act of stealing from the company.
meanings.sent3: Trying to highbind your way out of trouble will only lead to more problems.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to highbind her true intentions was like a magician's sleight of hand.
meanings.sent5: The scam artist highbinders his victims with promises of easy money.
